::DarkMouse::

She looked at Draconia.
"LEAVE AND DON"T COME BACK! GET IT! GO ON AND WALK OUT OF HERE! GO!"
SHe didn't care if she got slagged. She was tired of standing there 
with a gun in her face. She took her free hand and pushed the barrel 
out of her face.
"GO ON! LEAVE!"
